text: Sonic Forces is a 2017 platform game published by Sega and developed by Sonic Team. It was made alongside Sonic Mania to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise. It is available on the Nintendo Switch, the PlayStation 4, the Xbox One, Microsoft Windows and PlayStation 5. ==Gameplay== The gameplay is similar to that of Sonic Unleashed and Sonic Generations; the player controls Sonic or Shadow the Hedgehog and runs from the beginning of a level to the end, parkouring and defeating robotic enemies along the way. ==Plot== ==References== Category:2017 video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:PlayStation 4 games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox One games Category:Sega video games Category:Sonic the Hedgehog games
title: Sonic Forces
